payload.name: deductive-reasoning
payload.core: If premises are true and inference rules valid, the conclusion must be true; makes explicit what is implicit in premises.
check: no missing premises critical to reality?

diff.vs_ampliative: truth-preserving and monotonic; cannot generate new knowledge beyond what premises contain, unlike induction or abduction

fail.desc: false or missing premises yield unreliable conclusions despite valid argument structure

ex.scenario: verifying a requirement implies a system behavior
ex.approach: formalize premises, apply modus ponens to derive entailed conclusion
